metadata.title: CVE-2021-23976 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: When accepting a malicious intent from other installed apps, Firefox forAndroid accepted manifests from arbitrary file paths and allowed declaringwebapp manifests for other origins. This could be used to gain fullscreenaccess for UI spoofing and could also lead to cross-origin attacks ontargeted websites. Note: This issue is a different issue fromCVE-2020-26954 and only affected Firefox for Android. Other operatingsystems are unaffected. This vulnerability affects Firefox < 86.

criterions.comment: mozjs78 package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
